m_szDocSumamry: News:Open Source See also OS News stories relating to open source free energy projects. This separate news page was commenced Oct. 14, 2010. 2016 Featured / OS : Electromagnetic > Solid State > Joule Ringer / Govt. Deepthroat > Forum for Joule Ringer Development to Market - The government agent who worked on this technology five decades ago, that is similar to Professor Steven E. Jonesâ€™ Joule Ringer, thinks it is conceivable that we could eventually scale this solid state technology up to have a device the size and price of an air conditioner providing 20 kw. (PESWiki; February 9, 2016) Featur
